name: 森林生態學
description:
Forest ecosystems are important natural resources globally and are of particular importance in Taiwan because they cover approximately 58% of the land area of Taiwan. Forest ecosystems host the highly diverse animals, plants, and microbes in Taiwan including many endemic species. In addition, a healthy forest cover is essential for soil and water conservation of our steep and fragile island. A good knowledge of forest structure, function, and dynamics is the foundation for understanding the biodiversity and ecological characteristics of Taiwan. As a sub-discipline of ecology, forest ecology focuses ecological discussion within forest ecosystems. In addition to learning basic and fundamental knowledge of forest ecology, I hope to provide you in situ understanding of forest ecosystems. 
This course is designed for advanced undergraduate students and graduate students that are interested in working in forests. I hope the information you learn from this course will stimulate your interest in forest ecology related research. I consider this course to be a heavy one. We will read 10 papers and make two field trips with reports afterwards so I expect that all enrolled students are enthusiastic in forest ecology.
goals: 具備森林生態學的基礎核心概念
能熟讀並呈現森林生態學重要文獻
能提描述分析森林生態系結構功態與變動，並深入探討其驅動力
建構關心森林生態的情懷
syllabus:
Week 1 Introduction: Forests as ecosystems, global forest distribution

Week 2 Community ecology perspectives

Week 3 Landscape ecology perspectives

Week 4 Decomposition

Week 5 Nutrient cycling

Week 6 Forests and global change interactions

Week 7 Field trip to Yangminshan National Park

Week 8 Discussion on structure and function of Yangminshan (I)

Week 9 Discussion on structure and function of Yangminshan (II)

Week 10 Analysis of ecological data of Yangminshan Forest

Week 11 Presentation on ecology of Yangminshan Forest

Week 12 Field trip to Fushan Forest Ecosystem

Week 13 Discussion on structure and function of Fushan Forest Ecosystem (I)

Week 14 Discussion on structure and function of Fushan Forest Ecosystem (II)

Week 15 Analysis of ecological data of Fushan Forest Ecosystem

Week 16 Presentation on ecology of Yangminshan Forest

Week 17 Student presentations on comparisons between Fushan and Yangminshan Forest Ecosystems (I)

Week 18 Student presentations on comparisons between Fushan and Yangminshan Forest Ecosystems (I)

methodologies.note: 講述教育研究重要概念與理論
分析討論田野觀察及森林生態文獻
透過討發表陽明山與福山森林生態系的之比較：結構、功能、變動及其驅力

grading.note: 出席並參與田野觀察及課堂討論
